content.html:
File Type and Compression
Choose the movie file type and compression.

OptionDescription
H.264 ALL-I 420 MOVA highly-portable compressed format. Footage is recorded at a depth of 8 bits using All-I interframe compression and 4: 2:0 chroma sub-sampling.
H.264 LongGOP 420 MOVA highly-portable compressed format. Footage is recorded at a depth of 8 bits using Long GOP in- terframe compression and 4:2:0 chroma sub-sam- pling.
H.264 LongGOP 420 MP4A format suitable for movies that will be uploaded to the web.
H.265 ALL-I 420 MOVA format with a higher compression ratio than H.264. Footage is recorded at a depth of 10 bits us- ing All-I interframe compression and 4:2 :0 chroma sub-sampling.
H.265 LongGOP 420 MOVA format with a higher compression ratio than H.264. Footage is recorded at a depth of 10 bits us- ing Long GOP interframe compression and 4:2:0 chroma sub-sampling.
H.265 ALL-I 422 MOVA format with a higher compression ratio than H.264. Footage is recorded at a depth of 10 bits us- ing All-I interframe compression and 4:2:2 chroma sub-sampling.
H.265 LongGOP 422 MOVA format with a higher compression ratio than H.264. Footage is recorded at a depth of 10 bits us- ing Long GOP interframe compression and 4:2:2 chroma sub-sampling.
ProRes HQ MOV *Record movies in ProRes 422 HQ format.
ProRes 422 MOV *Record movies in ProRes 422 format.
ProRes LT MOV *Record movies in ProRes 422 LT format.

The
Shooting
Menus

* Available only when 1 is selected as the destination.

182
content.markdown:
# File Type and Compression
Choose the movie file type and compression.

| Option | Description |
| --- | --- |
| H.264 ALL-I 420 MOV | A highly-portable compressed format. Footage is recorded at a depth of 8 bits using All-I interframe compression and 4: 2:0 chroma sub-sampling. |
| H.264 LongGOP 420 MOV | A highly-portable compressed format. Footage is recorded at a depth of 8 bits using Long GOP in- terframe compression and 4:2:0 chroma sub-sam- pling. |
| H.264 LongGOP 420 MP4 | A format suitable for movies that will be uploaded to the web. |
| H.265 ALL-I 420 MOV | A format with a higher compression ratio than H.264. Footage is recorded at a depth of 10 bits us- ing All-I interframe compression and 4:2 :0 chroma sub-sampling. |
| H.265 LongGOP 420 MOV | A format with a higher compression ratio than H.264. Footage is recorded at a depth of 10 bits us- ing Long GOP interframe compression and 4:2:0 chroma sub-sampling. |
| H.265 ALL-I 422 MOV | A format with a higher compression ratio than H.264. Footage is recorded at a depth of 10 bits us- ing All-I interframe compression and 4:2:2 chroma sub-sampling. |
| H.265 LongGOP 422 MOV | A format with a higher compression ratio than H.264. Footage is recorded at a depth of 10 bits us- ing Long GOP interframe compression and 4:2:2 chroma sub-sampling. |
| ProRes HQ MOV * | Record movies in ProRes 422 HQ format. |
| ProRes 422 MOV * | Record movies in ProRes 422 format. |
| ProRes LT MOV * | Record movies in ProRes 422 LT format. |
